drawingPackage

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • drawingPackage.Screen
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlossaryScreen, PortfolioScreen, WorldScreen

    public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates the skeleton of the screens
    Author:
    Katia and Elise
